column4: I have a weird problem: gdm restarts when I type the first letter of my password. what could that be??
does it restart if you don't start typing?
no, only with the first type
the only thing that i can think of is x is crashing, have you checked your logs?
yes but I don't see anything serious
and now the login worked without anything changed... wtf???!
have you tried just a plain vesa driver just as a stab in the dark? i've never heard of this
well talking to us fixes most things magically
:-) I suppose it's not fixed yet
only the wait-mouse pointer, the interface didn't come up until I removed the DPMS option... ????
i don't have the faintest clue except to say, try a different driver
please don't say such cruel things
